trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> Web 服务器控件提供组件编辑器。

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface (UI) for editing the properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 组件编辑器用于编辑的属性提供用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> attribute to associate this editor with a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute>属性要扩展的类的相关联此编辑器<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> class and sets its initial page to 0.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> 类的新实例，并将其初始页设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> class and sets its initial page to the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor" /> 类的新实例，并将其初始页设置为指定索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects corresponding to the pages that can be edited using this editor.
trans-unit.target: 获取与可使用此编辑器进行编辑的页相对应的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects corresponding to the pages that can be edited using this editor.
trans-unit.target: 与可使用此编辑器进行编辑的页相对应的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to change the set of pages shown by the editor.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写此方法，若要更改的编辑器显示的页面的集。
